text: The 1920 Summer Olympics, officially known as the Games of the VII Olympiad, were held at Antwerp in Belgium.Sports Reference.com (SR/Olympics), "1920 Antwerpen Summer Games" ; retrieved 2012-7-23. The games were a financial strain for the host country and the participants. The events were not well attended.Zarnowski, C. Frank. "A Look at Olympic Costs," Citius, Altius, Fortius (US). Summer 1992, Vol. 1, Issue 1, p. 20-21 [5-6 of 17 PDF]; retrieved 2012-7-24. == Participating nations == A total of 22 nations sent athletes to compete at the Antwerp games.Taking part in the games for the first time were Czechoslovakia, Brazil, Estonia, Finland, Monaco, New Zealand and Yugoslavia. * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * ==Related pages== * List of IOC country codes ==References == ==Other websites== * IOC page for the 1920 Summer Olympics Category:1920 in Europe Category:1920s in Belgium Category:Summer Olympics in Europe Summer Olympic 1920 Category:Antwerp Category:1920 in sports
title: 1920 Summer Olympics
